data.title: Azula Corp
description: Demonstrated expertise as a freelance software developer proficient in designing and constructing innovative web applications.
Leveraged comprehensive knowledge of both backend and frontend development to contribute to seamless user experiences.
Utilized active programming skills to effectively build, customize, and optimize web applications. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional results within project deadlines.
Applied industry best practices to ensure robust functionality and high performance of developed applications.
Proven ability to adapt to rapidly changing technologies and stay updated with the latest software development trends.

data.title: Azula Corp
description: Developed and implemented a fully-functional e-commerce website as part of a team project, utilizing React and Firebase, resulting in a 20% increase in online sales for a local business
